alert.note: Alert for Prentiss; Tishomingo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tishomingo and northeastern Prentiss Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 500 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Burton, or 10 miles east of Booneville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Iuka, Tishomingo State Park, Tishomingo, Burton, Midway, Paden, Blythe Crossing, Bloody Springs, Carter Branch, Mingo, Holcut, Holts Spur, Petertown, Neil and Altitude. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
